name: Merge Bakery
description:
Ranked #1 tastiest idle game on your phone! How many cake recipes can you unlock? Become a Baking Tycoon!

COMBINE RECIPES and MERGE them to unlock brand-new delicious treats for your bakery! Start as a waffle house and expand your range of fresh bakes. Filled with over 40+ delectable bakery treats, from luxurious cookies to indulgent triple chocolate cakes!

FEED HUNGRY CUSTOMERS and keep them happy. The happier they are, the more successful your bakery is doing! As you level up, more seats will become available so there are always more sweet-tooths to feed!

GIVE INTO THE TEMPTATION and design your DREAM BAKERY the way you want it. Upgrade counters, booths, windows and much more to add your own personal flavour to the bakery. Can you make it the most stylish cake shop around?

SPOIL YOURSELF with our FREE TRIAL for 3 days! VIP Pass will be charged at $2.99 / £2.99 / €3,49 per week. After buying this subscription, your bakery will benefit from rewards, including: 120% offline earnings, +10 daily gems, +2 extra merge slots, +50% customer eating speed and all pop-up ads removed.
